work.summary: Ezidebit is a payment solution provider offering Direct Debit, BPAY and ecommerce solutions.
highlights: Internal IT support to an office of 100+ staff
Create & maintain scripts providing automation and simplification of routine tasks.

work.summary: Rivercity Solutions is a Managed Service Provider servicing small to medium businesses in Brisbane.
highlights: Active Directory & Group Policy administration ranging from Server 2003 to Server 2012.
First point of contact for over 50 Managed Clients.
Documentation of internal processes including server outage redemption & communication procedures.
Daily use of Connectwise, LabTech & ITGlue.

work.summary: Secure Access is a Managed Service Provider based in Maroochydore Sunshine Coast.
highlights: Remote and onsite support of Breakfix, Block & Managed clients.
Desktop and laptop repair as an Acer warranty technician.

skills.name: Customer Service
keywords: Communication and redemption of critical line of business applications.
